title: SamJacob
author: SamJacob
content: Segments Cloud is a Bitcoin Mining Machine retailer in Dubai that specializes in retailing, blockchain transaction processing and mining solutions. We own and operate crypto mining machines that mine Bitcoin and other cryptos. With segments, shareholders will get high returns by mitigating all speculative risks of holding cryptocurrencies. Apart from mitigating speculative risks, we manage power consumption and internet services to improve mining machines' performance.Website:https://www.segments.ae/
